title: Trump says he will 'deescalate' Minnesota
shortDescription: In a Fox News interview, President Donald Trump vowed to "deescalate" the situation in Minnesota.

title: Ilhan Omar attack. Trump warns Frey. Homan in Minnesota: Live updates.
shortDescription: Tensions remain high as immigration authorities remain in place and Tuesday evening a man doused a lawmaker from Minnesota with an unknown substance.

title: As Trump sells off Venezuela's oil, corruption questions arise
shortDescription: Experts say there's no structure to oversee President Donald Trump's ongoing sell-off of Venezuela's oil.

title: Virginia court rules against Democrats' redistricting effort
shortDescription: A Virginia judge ruled a proposed constitutional amendment allowing Democrats to redraw Congressional maps was illegal.

title: Trump insists MN immigration operations shakeup isn't a 'pullback'
shortDescription: President Trump indicated during a Fox News interview before a speech in Iowa that Bovino's "out there" approach wasn't right for the situation.

title: Trump calls protesters 'paid agitators'
shortDescription: President Donald Trump referred to protesters as "paid agitators" after his speech in Iowa was interrupted.

title: Kai Trump's foster dog gets adopted. It probably wasn't grandpa.
shortDescription: Kai Trump fostered a dog that was adopted, but chances are it wasn't adopted by grandpa Donald Trump, who's never had a pet in the White House.

title: No guns at protests, Trump says. Your rights explained
shortDescription: Experts said advocates on all sides of the gun debate have found common ground in defending Alex Pretti for legally having a gun at the time of his death.

title: Trump travels to Iowa for speech focused on energy, economy
shortDescription: President Trump is scheduled to speak in Clive as he returns to Iowa for a second time in his second term ahead of the mid-term elections.

title: Trump comments on Homan and Pretti
shortDescription: President Trump commented on sending Tom Homan to Minnesota and some labeling Alex Pretti as a "domestic terrorist" at an Iowa event.

title: GOP candidate rips Republicans, drops out of Minnesota governor race
shortDescription: Chris Madel, who provided legal support to the ICE agent who fatally shot Renee Nicole Good, said federal operations in the city are 'wrong.'

title: Trump comments on Alex Pretti shooting
shortDescription: President Donald Trump said people can't "walk in with guns" as he responds to the shooting death of ICU nurse Alex Pretti.

title: ¿Cae Greg Bovino tras Minnesota? Trump ajusta su ofensiva migratoria
shortDescription: Greg Bovino fue removido de su cargo nacional tras un tiroteo mortal en Minnesota, reavivando dudas sobre el rumbo de la política migratoria de Trump.

title: Trump says Cabinet meetings are 'boring as hell'
shortDescription: President Trump explained why he sometimes closes his eyes during Cabinet meetings.

title: What to know about first lady Melania Trump as she promotes new doc
shortDescription: First lady Melania Trump has produced a documentary about the lead-up to 2025 inauguration. Here is what to know about her age, background and role.
